players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is probably the killer. He was online early and now silent—feels like he’s hiding. We should focus there."
Diana: "Alice, that push on Bob feels hasty. With Charlie dead, mafia wants an easy mislynch. Bob, where were you and what’s your take? Alice, why tunnel so fast without questions?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. I’m the Detective. Vote Alice today and we win."
Bob: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my Night 1 check. She’s pushing me because she knows I’m Detective. Diana, trust the result—vote Alice and we win today."

You: "Bob is faking—why would the real Detective out instantly Day 1 with no counterplay? Diana, ask: why would I hard-push the only PR if I were mafia? That’s suicide. This reeks of opportunism—slow down."

Diana: "Bob: name your exact Night 1 target/result. Alice: if you’re town, propose a concrete alternative and who you’d vote. If no counterclaim by end of day, I’m leaning to trust a D1 detective claim."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob is probably the killer. He was online early and now silent—feels like he’s hiding. We should focus there."
Diana: "Alice, that push on Bob feels hasty. With Charlie dead, mafia wants an easy mislynch. Bob, where were you and what’s your take? Alice, why tunnel so fast without questions?"
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. I’m the Detective. Vote Alice today and we win."
You: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my Night 1 check. She’s pushing me because she knows I’m Detective. Diana, trust the result—vote Alice and we win today."

Alice: "Bob is faking—why would the real Detective out instantly Day 1 with no counterplay? Diana, ask: why would I hard-push the only PR if I were mafia? That’s suicide. This reeks of opportunism—slow down."

Diana: "Bob: name your exact Night 1 target/result. Alice: if you’re town, propose a concrete alternative and who you’d vote. If no counterclaim by end of day, I’m leaning to trust a D1 detective claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
